member.name: T:OrchardCore.Apis.GraphQL.ISchemaBuilder
member.summary: Implementations of this interface can participate in building the instance that is used for GraphQL requests.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Apis.GraphQL.ISchemaBuilder.GetIdentifierAsync
member.summary: Returns an unique identifier that is updated when the data that is used in the instance has changed, or an empty string if it has no dependencies, null being a valid value not yet updated.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Apis.GraphQL.ISchemaFactory
member.summary: Represents a service that provides the instance that is used in a GraphQL request. The result should be cached and reused when possible.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Apis.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddInputObjectGraphType``2(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Registers a type describing input arguments

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Apis.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddObjectGraphType``2(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Registers a type describing output arguments
